scripts.dev: npm run build:mcp && concurrently "next dev --turbopack" "node mcp-server-dist/index.js"
scripts.build:mcp: tsc src/lib/api.ts --outDir mcp-server-dist --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution bundler --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck && tsc mcp-server-dist/index.ts --outDir mcp-server-dist --module esnext --target es2020 --moduleResolution bundler --esModuleInterop --skipLibCheck

name: amber-tech-portfolio
description: This is the existing [blog-starter](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/tree/canary/examples/blog-starter) plus TypeScript.
